entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1500 metres rising to 1800 metres this morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning late this evening. Snow level lowering to 1500 metres overnight. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
